name: Alive by Campfire
description:
Alive by Campfire is a short survival game set around a campfire. Monsters are trying to snuff out the flames, and you must protect your companion and keep the fire alive. How long can you last?

This game was made for the 2020 VimJam! 

It's a rough prototype of the idea I had of a character going "there and back" to defend an area, picking up collectables along the way and having to choose whether to ignore one or risk a monster reaching your base. 

Have fun and feedback would be much appreciated!

CONTROLS:

Left Click -> Move Character

Right Click -> Attack
